contentList.content: Lunar Smite

Engulf your weapon in divine moonlight, deal an additional [1] and inflicting <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_HOLY">Holy Flame</LSTag> on a hit. If the target is Undead, possible <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TURNED">Turn</LSTag> them.
Tasha's Caustic Brew
Snilloc's Snowball Swarm
Tasha's Mind Whip
Melf's Minute Meteors
Melf's Minute Meteors
Melf's Minute Meteors
Create an additional dart every other level.
Conjure Volley: Melee Weapon
Throw a weapon into the air. Hundreds of duplicates of the weapon fall in a volley from above and then disappear, damaging creatures within a [1] radius area.
Conjure Volley: Ammunition
Fire a piece of ammunition from a ranged weapon into the air. Hundreds of duplicates of the ammunition fall in a volley from above and then disappear, damaging creatures in a [1] radius area.

Inextinguishable flames burn the entity for [1] each turn. Emits a bright light for [2]. Repeats the Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> at the end of its turn, ending the spell if successful.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrain</LSTag> a target and, after [1] failed <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, the target becomes inactive solid gold indefinitely.
The golden <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PETRIFIED">Petrification</LSTag> can only be removed by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_GreaterRestoration">Greater Restoration</LSTag> or similar spells.
Flesh to Gold: Saving Throw
Affected entity will break free if it succeeds [1] <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to the next elemental attack. The other elements <LSTag Tooltip="Resistance">Resistances</LSTag> end, and the immunity lasts until the end of your next turn, at which time the spell ends.

A celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend who fails their save is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUPER_BANISHED">permanently banished</LSTag>. Other foes with less than 50 hit points are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEAFENED">Deafened</LSTag>, less than 40 hit points are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>, less than 30 hit points are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag>, and less than 20 hit points are killed instantly.
Eight multicolored rays of light flash toward every creature in a [1] cone. Each ray is a different color and has a different power and effect.

Colors red, orange, yellow, green, and blue deal [1], [2], [3], [4], or [5], respectively. An indigo ray has a chance to cause <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PETRIFIED">Petrification</LSTag>. A violet ray has a chance to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUPER_BANISHED">Permanently Banish</LSTag> the target to another plane of existence. A particularly unlucky target might be struck by two rays.
Touch a creature to stimulate its natural healing ability, healing it immediately and causing it to regain [1] at the start of its turns.
The target's severed body parts, if any, are also restored.
Regains [1] per turn.
Befuddlement
Befuddled
Scroll of Befuddlement
Befuddlement
Shatter a creature's intellect and personality, preventing it from casting spells.
Befuddled
Cannot cast spells.

<LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Psychic damage and being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> and is also unaffected by anything that senses its emotions, read its thoughts, or control its mind.

Speak a word of power that overwhelms the mind of a creature you can see within range. If the creature has [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> or fewer, it gains the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> condition. Otherwise, its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is [2] until the start of your next turn.
Immobile
Weathered a hit from Power Word Stun. <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is 0.
Abi-Dalzim's Horrid Wilting
Scroll of Abi-Dalzim's Horrid Wilting
A flood of healing energy flows from you into allies around you. Restore up to [1] to allies within range, divided up among any number of creatures you can see within range.

Creatures healed by this spell also have the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEAFENED">Deafened</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> conditions removed.

Speak a word of healing that fully restores one creature you can see within range. All HITPOINTS are regained and if the creature has the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyzed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> condition, the condition ends.
